00032 #ifndef _MATRIX_H
00033 #define _MATRIX_H
00034 
00035 #include "Vector.h"
00036 
00037 //   | m00 m10 m20 tx |    |  m0  m4  m8 m12 |    |  m0  m1  m2  m3 |
00038 //   | m01 m11 m21 ty |    |  m1  m5  m9 m13 |    |  m4  m5  m6  m7 |
00039 //   | m02 m12 m22 tz |    |  m2  m6 m10 m14 |    |  m8  m9 m10 m11 |
00040 //   |  0   0   0  tw |    |  m3  m7 m11 m15 |    | m12 m13 m14 m15 |
00041 //
00042 //      OpenGL style          OpenGL matrix            standard C
00043 //                             arrangement             convention
00044 //
00045 //This matrix class is based on the openGL implimentation of a matirx
00046 
00047 class Quaternion;
00048 class Matrix {
00049     static const int Matrix4x4 = 16;
00050     Real m_mat[Matrix4x4];
00051 
00052 public:
00053 //C'tors
00054     Matrix();
00055     Matrix(const Vector3 &vec);
00056     Matrix(const Real &x, const Real &y, const Real &z);
00057     Matrix(const Real &rad, const Vector3 &axis);
00058     Matrix(const Real &rad, const Real &x, const Real &y, const Real &z);
00059     Matrix(const Quaternion &quat);
00060     Matrix(const Real *oldMatrix);
00061     ~Matrix();
00062 
00063 //Axis/Angle Conversions
00064     void toAxisAngle(Real &rad, Vector3 &axis) const;
00065     void toAxisAngle(Real &rad, Real &x, Real &y, Real &z) const;
00066     void fromAxisAngle(const Real &rad, const Vector3 &axis);
00067     void fromAxisAngle(const Real &rad, const Real &x, const Real &y, const Real &z);
00068 
00069 //Euler Conversions
00070     Vector3 toEuler() const;
00071     void toEuler(Vector3 &euler) const;
00072     void toEuler(Real &x, Real &y, Real &z) const;
00073 
00074     void fromEuler(const Vector3 &euler);
00075     void fromEuler(const Real &x, const Real &y, const Real &z);
00076 
00077 //Quaternion Conversions
00078     Quaternion toQuaternion() const;
00079     void toQuaternion(Quaternion &q) const;
00080     void fromQuaternion(const Quaternion &q);
00081 
00082 //Vector Application
00083     void apply(Vector3 &vec) const;
00084     void applyInverse(Vector3 &vec) const;
00085     void applyRotation(Vector3 &vec) const;
00086     void applyInvRotation(Vector3 &vec) const;
00087     void applyTranslation(Vector3 &vec) const;
00088     void applyInvTranslation(Vector3 &vec) const;
00089 
00090 //GL Helpers
00091     void makeClippingMatrix();
00092     void makeProjectionMatrix();
00093     void makeModelviewMatrix();
00094     void findMatrix(const Vector3 &from, const Vector3 &to);
00095     
00096 //Matrix Operations
00097 //These create a matrix (A) and multiply it by the current matrix (B)
00098 //and sets the current matrix to the result: B = A * B
00099 //This allows you to easily chain events as the current matrix will apply
00100 //folowed by the created matrix.
00101     void scale(const Vector3 &vec);
00102     void scale(Real x, Real y, Real z);
00103     void translate(const Vector3 &vec);
00104     void translate(Real x, Real y, Real z);
00105     void rotate(Real radians, const Vector3 &axis);
00106     void rotate(Real radians, Real x, Real y, Real z);
00107     void rotateD(Real degrees, const Vector3 &axis);
00108     void rotateD(Real degrees, Real x, Real y, Real z);
00109 
00110 //Accessors
00111     void loadIdentity();
00112     void set(const Matrix &matrix);
00113     void set(const Real *matrix);
00114     const Real *getMatrix() const { return m_mat; }
00115 
00116     void setScale(const Vector3 &scale);
00117     void setScale(Real x, Real y, Real z);
00118     void setTranslation(const Vector3 &offset);
00119     void setTranslation(Real x, Real y, Real z);
00120     void setRotation(Real radians, const Vector3 &scale);
00121     void setRotation(Real radians, Real x, Real y, Real z);
00122     void setRotationD(Real degrees, const Vector3 &scale);
00123     void setRotationD(Real degrees, Real x, Real y, Real z);
00124     
00125 //Operators
00126     void multiply(const Real* m1, const Real* m2, Real newMatrix[16]);
00127     void postMultiply(const Matrix &rhs);
00128     void preMultiply(const Matrix &rhs);
00129 
00130     Matrix operator*(const Matrix &lhs);
00131     Vector3 operator*(const Vector3 &lhs);
00132 
00133     Matrix& operator=(const Matrix &other);
00134     bool operator==(const Matrix &other) const;
00135     bool operator!=(const Matrix &other) const;
00136 
00137     const Real& operator[](int index) const;
00138     Real& operator[](int index);
00139 
00140 //Tests
00141     static void Test();
00142     static void TestRotation();
00143     static void TestTranslation();
00144     static void TestScaling();
00145     
00146     static void TestCombination();
00147     static void TestComplex();
00148     static void TestFindMatrix();
00149 
00150     static void TestEulerConversions();
00151     static void TestAxisAngleConversions();
00152     static void TestQuaternionConversions();
00153 };
00154 
00155 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &lhs, const Matrix &rhs);
00156 #endif
